title: Time Records
text: Backend C# WEB API utilizing MariaDB database. Endpoints connected to the React frontend (see Frontend portfolio)
technologies: C# ASP.NET Core, MariaDB, Swagger UI

title: Wildlife Reserve
text: Backend C# WEB API utilizing MariaDB database and connected to the external iNaturalist WEB API. Endpoints integrated with React frontend (see Frontend portfolio).
technologies: C# ASP.NET Core, iNaturalist API, MariaDB, Swagger UI

title: School
text: A web application for tracking and grading students based on subjects.
